channel.title: Shopofhorrors.com podcast
channel.description: shopofhorrors podcast where the cryptkeeper rants and raves , join in on crypty's podcasts for a different rollin on the floor and pee in your pants perspective. [EXPLICIT DIALOG AT TIMES, NOT INTENDED FOR LISTENERS UNDER THE AGE OF 18 ]

item.title: Episode 7 August 16th 2008 Sic Inc Tattoo 1st Anniversary
item.description: Here is a Video From August 16th 2008 that was taken During Sic Inc Tattoo's 1st Anniversary - This Vid was shot in parts and uploaded 1 clip - 30 mins play time - Anniversary was held from 5:00 till ???? at a local bar and grill up the street from sic inc tattoo studio located at 337 Main Street - Latrobe Pa = the local area's Best and Most Professional Tattooist - You can also see jasons work at myspace.com/sicinctattoos - they also have atom the body piercer on staff also and provide the local clients a clean and hospital sterile and friendly tattoo or piercing session.
item.dc:creator: Jim Gracie
